blog.name: brideofkylosolo
blog.title: Amusings of my Mind
blog.description:
Welcome to my little slice of hell, please keep your arms and legs inside the cart at all times, remain seated and enjoy your ride.My blog for all things nerdy; current obssiosns are Adam Driver and Natalie Dormer with a pinch of Cody Fern, Kit Harrington, and other random fandoms.  I also write fanfics so please feel free to drop a prompt for one of my pairing: Adam x Amelia (OC) (Girls). Clyde x Kadlyn (OC) (Logan Lucky), Flip x Dani (OC) (BlackKklansman), Phillip x Claire (OC) (This is where I Leave You), and Ben Solo x Aria Lyons (OC) (SW AU) (alt: Kylo and Kyna (OC)).  Feel free as well to follow my other blogs: aceposfeminist, amusingsofmymind,
ratz2u,
engmfastudyblr,
thewiccanway, and
fujoshifanpage

body:
Random idea

Just had the most random and possibly brilliant idea for a crossover fanfic. Margaery Tyrell does not die on the sept, instead she wakes up on… the Finalizer as a prisoner of Snoke. She’s later rescued by… Ben Organa-Solo, the leader of the burgeoning resistance.

reblog.comment:

summary: Customizing a Rubies DL-44 to look like the one from Episode IV. Should have puttied the screw holes but this particular Rubies...

summary:
Finn Relationship Week - Day 5: Non-Canon Relationships
I had this idea that Finn and Anakin will get along if they had an...
body:
Finn Relationship Week - Day 5: Non-Canon Relationships

I had this idea that Finn and Anakin will get along if they had an interaction. Anakin will remind Finn of both himself and Padme. Honestly, I think Finn has the most similarities to the main heroes of the previous trilogies among all the sequel main cast. This is just my humble opinion. If Finn trains with a lightsaber, the force ghost of Anakin Skywalker will guide him in the ways of the force.

For @finnappreciation

blog.name: recklessdarkness
blog.title: Reckless Darkness

summary: Yes, I got Phasma tattooed! I just couldn’t be happier! And I thought it was a good moment to explain a little bit why she’s so...
body:
Yes, I got Phasma tattooed! I just couldn’t be happier! And I thought it was a good moment to explain a little bit why she’s so important to me.

No words can express how much Phasma means to me. The sentence tattooed right bellow is a line from her novel, and when I read it I felt like it was written for me to say. It just described me perfectly. In the beginning of this year, I struggled with depression, not exactly for the first time. I needed a strong character to inspire me to go on, and right at this moment I read the Phasma novel and it simply changed my life. Phasma kinda taught me to be strong again, and that’s why she’s so important to me. It’s amazing how, thanks to her novel, I’m now fighting to follow my own path and my own dreams. Everything has a purpose in life, and if I’m strong enough to face the whole world to fight for what I wanna do, it’s thanks to Phasma 🖤💪🏻
